text: "Baby, Please Don't Go" is a 1935 blues song by Big Joe Williams. Many cover versions followed including Muddy Waters, Little Walter, Them featuring Van Morrison, AC/DC, Budgie ==References== Category:1935 songs Category:Blues music Category:Muddy Waters songs Category:Little Walter songs Category:Them (band) songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Aerosmith songs Category:Van Morrison songs Category:John Mellencamp songs
title: Baby Please Don't Go
